name: No Swimming Past This Point
description:
Created for Mini Jam 126: Lost in February 2023 with a limitation of "Time is a resource".

Kate has gotten lost in the dark while diving. Help her find her way back to the surface without running out of air or light!

This game unfortunately had much more to the design than we were able to deliver in this timeframe. We intend to continue work on this and add more story elements, as well as more dangers and enemies to avoid.

Controls:

WASD/ArrowsSwimEInteractShift/FBoost flashlightEscPause/show status

Designed by SAWD Games and luisdenpixel

Programmed by Justin Chartier and John Day

Art direction and graphics by luisdenpixel

https://www.fiverr.com/luisdenpixel/create-quality-pixel-art-of-anything-you-wan...

Dialogs by Dialogic

https://github.com/coppolaemilio/dialogic/tree/dialogic-1
